channel.title: Client error on windows 7
channel.description:
here is the error after i click twice it crash and throws this code im runing windows 7 64bit if this helps :)
[code]Exion Client Initialized, revision # 317 NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 2 # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d8475f6, pid=5820, t id=5356 # # JRE version: 6.0_22-b04 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (17.1-b03 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x575f6] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Nomeck\Documents\runescape\Exion\Client\hs_err_pid5820.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
